title: Professional Experiences
description: For twenty(+) years I've contributed my skills and talents to; five startups, three non-profits, and seven large to small companies.  The following be a sample of somewhat relevant history.

sections.heading: Digital Mercenaries LLC
sections.description: Developed and deployed a high-performance and simple to maintain website, leveraging both frontend and backend technologies, while ensuring seamless integration with CI/CD pipelines.

sections.heading: Opentensor Foundation
sections.description: Led a team of talented Rust software engineers in the development an internet-scale neural network incentivized by blockchain technologies.

sections.heading: Bored Box dot IO
sections.description: Developed backend, blockchain, and CI/CD infrastructure for efficiently and securely delivering assets to a global customers.

sections.heading: BitBiz dot IO
sections.description: Before terms such as "DApp" or "DAO" where coined, I led a team of forum moderators and consulted for a variety of crypto businesses
